ContentWorkspaceDoc.name: ContentWorkspaceDoc
ContentWorkspaceDoc.description: Represents a link between a document and a public library in Salesforce CRM Content.

ContentDocumentId.description: Read only. ID of the library document.

ContentWorkspaceId.description: Read only. ID of the library.

IsOwner.description: Read only. Indicates whether the library owns the document and determines permissions for that document (true) or not (false). Documents can belong to more than one library, but only one library owns the document and determines its permissions.
